metadata.title: Webswize | Home
metadata.description: Web dev service as you like it.

slider.name: Responsive
slider.title: Responsive and Well-Organized web design
slider.description: One of our main concerns is to take care of your website's responsivness and give it the best possible design.

slider.name: Interactive
slider.title: Fully interactive web applications
slider.description: We use the best libraries and frameworks to make the website interactive to users.

slider.name: Creative
slider.title: Creative, modern and attractive design
slider.description: The creation of your website's design is crucial, we take care of that.

seo.title: Full support of search engine optimization
seo.description: Search engine optimization is very important for a website in order to appear at the top, we use SEO friendly libraries and packages to improve core web vitals, metadata and other factors that boost the ranking.

frontEndAndbackEnd.title: Works on both front-end and back-end
frontEndAndbackEnd.description: In most cases, websites require both front-end and back-end for full functionality. Based on the website's content, we make a corresponding front-end that runs on the client, and a back-end that runs on the server, if necessary, we use database and then use an API to retrieve data from it.

security.title: Une navigation sécurisée et des informations d'identification sûres
security.description: Nous garantissons à nos clients que la navigation sur leur site web sera entièrement sécurisée et que les informations d'identification de l'utilisateur seront préservées.

workTime.title: Open to work at any time
workTime.description: As said, we're open to work, you can visit our contact page.

info.title: Who we are
info.text: Webswize is a web development project that was created in May 2023 by a small group of developers and designers, it started by creating, fixing, and maintaining small business websites. The main idea of the project was to improve the web performance mostly in Algeria, from user interface to user experience, and to bring a modern touch to the Algerian web.

info.title: Who we are
info.text: As a new business, we want to start by gaining our clients' trust, this is why we only provide secure features, we don't rush into using easier ways at the cost of losing credibility. We also like our clients to give us feedback so we can know how to improve our work. We provide many important modern website features, such as search engine optimization, safe and fast navigation, beautiful and creative user interface, databases, Rest APIs, CTAs, blogs, and helpful AI tools.

info.title: Who we are
info.text: In the future, we aim to expand our team by recruiting more competent workers, organizing collaboration teams, and creating educational content.
